result.title: Updated Scientific Report on the theoretical capabilities of ideal HSF
result.description: This deliverable will advance D5.1 (which focused on a single node pair) and proceed to model and evaluate via computer simulations of a complete controller node network for an HSF. High number of network nodes and substantially computational capabilities per node will be considered.

result.title: Report on the comparison between ideal HSFs and the manufactured prototypes
result.description: This deliverable will consolidate the outcomes of D5.1 and D5.2 to provide realistic simulations of ideal HSFs, stemming from the use of the THz band and extremely dense networks of nano-sized controllers. Subsequently, it will provide a scientific report on the theoretical HSF capabilities and will be compared to the status of the manufactured prototypes. This comparison will serve as an indicator of the future development margin of HSFs.
